as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

defaultValue.description: The default value of the number field.

modelValue.description: The current value of the number field.

min.description: The smallest value allowed for the input.

max.description: The largest value allowed for the input.

step.description: The amount that the input value changes with each increment or decrement 'tick'.
step.description_zh: 每次增量或减量"滴答"时输入值的变化量.

formatOptions.description: Formatting options for the value displayed in the number field. This also affects what characters are allowed to be typed by the user.
formatOptions.description_zh: 数字字段中显示的值的格式选项。这也会影响用户允许输入的字符.

locale.description: The locale to use for formatting dates.
locale.description_zh: 用于格式化日期的区域设置.

disabled.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the Number Field.
disabled.description_zh: 当为`true`时,阻止用户与数字字段交互.

required.description: When `true`, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.
required.description_zh: 当为`true`时,表示用户必须设置值才能提交所属表单.

name.description: The name of the number field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.
name.description_zh: 数字字段的名称.与其所属表单一起提交，作为名称/值对的一部分.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Emitted when the modelValue is updated.
events.description_zh: 当 modelValue 更新时发出.
